This is a list of all stable versions available for download.

Maven users can just add the following dependency to automatically download from Maven Central:
{{{
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.purej</groupId>
      <artifactId>purej-vminspect</artifactId>
      <version>1.0</version>
    </dependency>
}}}

_Note:_ *purej-vminspect* relies on *JRobin* for statistics graphics, non-Maven users need to get the [http://sourceforge.net/projects/jrobin JRobin] library manually (Version *1.5.9* tested and recommended, this is the latest version available also in Maven Central).
